summary: Add role-based onboarding: set a specific existing account as permanent Manager and default all newly created accounts to Assistant to simplify login/role assignment.
architectural_notes: Introduce user roles (Manager, Assistant) with default role = Assistant for newly created users; bootstrap a designated user ID ("Jay") as permanent Manager.
known_issues: Current login/onboarding flow is too complex because there is no 'first user becomes manager' / default role assignment.

existing_features.title: Ensure the frontend onboarding copy reflects the new role assignment rule: "Jay" is the Manager account, and all other new accounts will be Assistants by default.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement role-based defaults: assign user ID "Jay" as permanent Manager and set all new accounts to Assistant by default

Update backend user profile creation/registration logic so that the account whose username/user ID equals "Jay" is always assigned the Manager role, and every other newly created user profile is assigned the Assistant role by default.

projectName: Make user 'Jay' the permanent Manager and default all new users to Assistant
